# Influencer Engagement

This project simulates influencer reach vs. engagement efficiency.  

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

set.seed(42)
influencers <- tibble(
  name = c("Trendsetter Tara", "Glamour Guru", "MicroMarketer Mia"),
  reach = c(50000, 80000, 20000),
  engagements = c(3200, 4600, 1500)
) %>%
  mutate(rate = round(100*engagements/reach, 2))

influencers
